#Text=GWAR frontman Dave Brockie aka Oderus Urungus dies at age 50
#Text=Tuesday , March 25 , 2014
#Text=Brockie as Oderus Urungus onstage in 2010 .
#Text=Image : Stuart Sevastos .
#Text=Dave Brockie of rubber-costumed metal act GWAR was found dead in his Richmond , Virginia home late on Sunday .
#Text=Better known by stage name Oderus Urungus , Brockie was 50 .
#Text=Founder , singer , leader , and occasional bassist of GWAR , Brockie 's career stretches back to 1984 .

#Text=He and fellow Virginia Commonwealth University art students formed what they dubbed " Earth 's only openly extra-terrestrial rock band " , growing famous for satirical and obscene lyrical themes , and live shows featuring the defilement of effigies and plenty of fake blood .

column1: #Text=Fellow founding member Don Drakulich , who still makes props and costumes for the rockers , said he was " very sad " and " shocked " .
#Text=He said Brockie 's roommate found the corpse .

#Text=GWAR members changed frequently and the band recovered from the sudden death of guitarist Cory " Flattus Maximus " Smoot during a 2011 tour , but the New York Daily News notes " it 's hard to envision their saga going further " after Brockie 's death .

column1: #Text=The band ran with the backstory of crashing to " the most insignificant planet in the universe " 43 million years ago before creating humans by having sex with apes .

column1: #Text=Becoming encased with ice , the legend ran that upon thawing out in 1984 the members decided to form a band .
#Text=I am one of the blessed people that gets to do what I love to do for a living — Brockie in 2009
#Text=Manager Jack Flanagan announced the death via GWAR 's website , adding a post-mortem will be conducted .
#Text=" My main focus right now is to look after my band mates and his family " he said .
#Text=Flanagan said another GWAR member found the body .
#Text=Brockie said in 2009 " I am one of the blessed people that gets to do what I love to do for a living . "
#Text=GWAR received a Grammy nomination in 1993 , with Phallus in Wonderland up for Best Longform Music Video .
#Text=Fellow Virginia rocker Randy Blythe , vocalist for Lamb of God , paid tribute online , writing on Instagram
#Text=" When someone dies , a lot of the time people will say ' Oh , he was a unique person , really one of a kind , a true original ' [ ... ]

#Text= I wish it was a joke " said another ex-member , Chris Bopst .

column1: #Text=" Everyone is in shock . "
#Text=Former bassist Mike Bishop paid tribute in an interview with Style Weekly .
#Text=" Dave was one of the funniest , smartest , most creative and energetic persons I 've known , " he said .
#Text=" He was brash sometimes , always crass , irreverent , he was hilarious in every way .
